Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.Space
      • main.java.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerInterface

    public class Player
extends Space
implements PlayerInterface
    Emulates a player on the board by utilizing the same information as a space, but with extra behaviors and attributes.
    Author:
    Matthew Coupal
